text: Emma Frost is a British screenwriter and showrunner, known for her work in the television series Shameless, The White Queen, Jamaica Inn, The Man in the High Castle, and The White Princess. Her film work includes the BBC Four drama Consuming Passion and the screenplay to Zelda, a film in development by Ron Howard. She is based in Falmouth, Cornwall. Frost is a trustee of the children's arts charity Anno's Africa. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:People from Falmouth, Cornwall Category:Showrunners Category:British women screenwriters Category:Women television writers Category:British television writers Category:Women television producers
title: Emma Frost (screenwriter)
